description: Unique identifier for the Prime Contract Line Item associated with the markup.  This ensures synchronization between the estimated value (without vertical markup) and  the revenue value (with vertical markup) in the integrated ERP system.  Applicable only to vertical markups on a prime contract or prime contract change order  when the ERP Integrations tool (Ryvit or Sage 300 CRE) is enabled. You need to pass query parameter `view=with_erp_data` to retrieve this value.
